attributes.value: Has a negative view of those who exercise power over others
Sees those that attempt to maintain dignified and proper behavior as vain and offensive
Disregards tradition
Sees introspection as important
Prefers a noisy, bustling life to boring days without activity
Sees sacrifice as wasteful and foolish
Values leisure time
Almost never feels discouraged
Never becomes angry
Is often nervous
Is stubborn
Is stingy with resources on projects and refuses to expend any extra effort
Could not care less about her appearance, talents or other personal vanities
Generally acts impartially and is rarely moved to mercy
Tends to consider what others think of her
Tends not to reveal personal information
Is inattentive to detail in her own work
Is very comfortable around others that are different from her
Can get caught up in internal deliberations when action is necessary
Is obsessed with order and structure in her own life, with everything kept in its proper place
Would never under any circumstances speak up or otherwise put forth her point of view in a discussion
Weak
Slow to heal
A good intellect
A little difficulty with words
An atrocious spatial sense
